page.post_content:
Join the classes and learn the secrets of traditional wood fire pizza as our Pizza Chefs take you through the history of pizza making & the techniques that make the perfect pizza! For enquiries, please contact reservations@crinitis.com.au
  • KIDS PIZZA CLASSES
  • CORPORATE PIZZA CLASSES
